Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI can only go so far and don't know about how i have performed in other assignments, in class or what i personally/academically struggle with. Teacher feedback is much more personalised and they understand most if not all nuance to my writing and can ask questions as to why i have made certain choices, being able to deliberate with me.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI was direct and had no compassion, but a teacher sat down with me and told me where i went wrong and how they understand how i got to that conclusion.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI had no constructive feedback it simply corrected the mistakes and moved on, but a teacher taught me how to correct them so i could leanr for next time.
